Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Necklace counterweight
Description: Counterweight of a menat, a type of necklace of religious use. It represents the goddess Hathor in profile, the head adorned with horns encircling the solar disc. Traces of paint remain here and there, blue for the hair and the body, and black for the eyes and the horns.
